I'm Kevin Yap
A Front End Developer
based in KL, MY

Me

I am 25 years old and have 3.5 years experience in digital field. I specialise in crafting clean and reusable code and understand the process from the perspective of a designer and developer. I love structure and order and I also stand for quality. I love spending time on fixing little details and optimizing the code. I also like working in a team because I will learn faster and more. As the saying goes: 'Two heads are better than one'.

My Equipment

Web Languages: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, STYLUS, Javascript/Jquery, AngularJS, ReactJS Software skills: Photoshop, Illustrator, Fireworks, Sublime Text, Google Web Designer Responsive Front-end Framework: Foundation by Zurb, Bootstrap
Mobile Web App Framework: Ionic Productivity: Git, SVN, Grunt, Gulp Miscelaneous: HTML5 Banner
